title: Performance Tips for Express.js Apps
author: John Smith
excerpt: Quick wins to make your Express.js apps faster: compression, caching, and efficient static delivery.
content:
Performance matters. Start with compression() to gzip responses, set proper Cache-Control headers for static files, and enable ETag/Last-Modified for validation.

  • Use compression middleware
  • Cache static assets aggressively
  • Profile and monitor
